snippet: Families gathered at the plaza of the World Trade Center memorial as the unidentified remains of people killed there were moved to what may be their final resting place.
abstract: Families of Sept 11 victims gather at plaza of World Trade Center memorial as the unidentified remains of people killed there are moved to what may be their final resting place, repository at ground zero; some relatives of victims wore black gags over their mouths to protest what they said was a lack of consultation about the decision to move the remains to what is likely to be a major tourist attraction.
lead_paragraph: Families gathered at the plaza of the World Trade Center memorial as the unidentified remains of people killed there were moved to what may be their final resting place.

headline.main: In ‘Ceremonial Transfer,’ Remains of 9/11 Victims Are Moved to Memorial
headline.print_headline: In ‘Ceremonial Transfer,’ Remains of 9/11 Victims Are Moved to Memorial
